articles.description: While Google launches and discontinues products at a rate that no one can keep up with, Apple’s modern track record for sticking with its bets is virtually unparalleled. But nothing lasts forever. This week brought the beginning of the end for Music Memos.
articles.content: While Google launches and discontinues products at a rate that no one can keep up with, Apples modern track record for sticking with its bets is virtually unparalleled among its peers. But nothing la… [+1414 chars]
